journal.name: Rate your knowledge: What do you know about Differentiated Instruction?
journal.intro:
Tell us what you know about Differentiated Instruction. Add a journal entry (about 3 sentences) of your understanding of Differentiated Instruction and tell us if you consider yourself a:
- Differentiated Instruction expert--You apply the principles in your teaching every day;
- Differentiated Instruction novice--You consider the principles and are learning more about the framework;
- Differentiated Instruction newbie--the term Differentiated Instruction and its guidelines are still new to you.
